[LeetCode] Merge Two Sorted Lists

Sep 23, 2014
5 minute read

Merge Two Sorted Lists

merge两个有序链表，思路如下，先通过判断l1和l2的头结点，找到merge之后表的头结点，然后边移动l1和l2指针边进行判断，将较小的连接到merge之后的表上即可，某一个链表跑到尾部之后，直接将另一个链表的剩余元素全部链接到merge之后表的尾部即可。代码如下：

 1 /**
 2  * Definition for singly-linked list.
 3  * struct ListNode {
 4  *     int val;
 5  *     ListNode *next;
 6  *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(NULL) {}
 7  * };
 8  */
 9 class Solution {
10 public:
11     ListNode *mergeTwoLists(ListNode *l1, ListNode *l2) {
12         if (l1 == NULL) return l2;
13         if (l2 == NULL) return l1;
14 
15         ListNode *head, *cur;
16         if (l1->val < l2->val)
17         {
18             head = cur = l1;
19             l1 = l1->next;
20         }
21         else 
22         {
23             head = cur = l2;
24             l2 = l2->next;
25         }
26         while (l1 != NULL && l2 != NULL)
27         {
28             if (l1->val < l2->val)
29             {
30                 cur->next = l1;
31                 l1 = l1->next;
32             }
33             else
34             {
35                 cur->next = l2;
36                 l2 = l2->next;
37             }
38             cur = cur->next;
39         }
40         if (l1 == NULL) cur->next = l2;
41         if (l2 == NULL) cur->next = l1;
42         return head;
43     }
44 };

其上代码可以进行优化，由于head是个特殊结点，新建一个头结点，然后就消除了head这个头结点的特殊情况，代码如下：

 1 /**
 2  * Definition for singly-linked list.
 3  * struct ListNode {
 4  *     int val;
 5  *     ListNode *next;
 6  *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(NULL) {}
 7  * };
 8  */
 9 class Solution {
10 public:
11     ListNode *mergeTwoLists(ListNode *l1, ListNode *l2) {
12         if (l1 == NULL) return l2;
13         if (l2 == NULL) return l1;
14 
15         ListNode *start = new ListNode(0);
16         ListNode *cur = start;
17         while (l1 != NULL && l2 != NULL)
18         {
19             if (l1->val < l2->val)
20             {
21                 cur->next = l1;
22                 l1 = l1->next;
23             }
24             else
25             {
26                 cur->next = l2;
27                 l2 = l2->next;
28             }
29             cur = cur->next;
30         }
31         if (l1 == NULL) cur->next = l2;
32         if (l2 == NULL) cur->next = l1;
33         return start->next;
34     }
35 };

以上代码内存释放的问题就略过了。

另外，GZShi还有一个递归版本，形式非常简单也非常好理解。

 1 /**
 2  * Definition for singly-linked list.
 3  * struct ListNode {
 4  *     int val;
 5  *     ListNode *next;
 6  *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(NULL) {}
 7  * };
 8  */
 9 class Solution {
10 public:
11     ListNode *mergeTwoLists(ListNode *l1, ListNode *l2) {
12         if (l1 == NULL) return l2;
13         if (l2 == NULL) return l1;
14 
15         if (l1->val < l2->val)
16         {
17             l1->next = mergeTwoLists(l1->next, l2);
18             return l1;
19         }
20         else
21         {
22             l2->next = mergeTwoLists(l1, l2->next);
23             return l2;
24         }
25     }
26 };
